name: IOOS Catalog
description: The IOOS Data Catalog is the master inventory of publicly-available DMAC datasets and data access services, powered by the CKAN open data portal. It offers both a web-based user interface and an API for machine-to-machine query, and is populated by ISO 19115 metadata records that describe the observations taken and forecast model outputs produced by the RAs and DACs using DMAC-recommended standard vocabularies and data formats. The Catalog harvests metadata from registered sources on a daily basis, enabling users to discover and access ocean observing data products.
